oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Horoscope of ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib : manuscript, undated
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 9 lines written in black framed within double red lines. On the obverse is a miniature of ʻAlī, on the reverse the horoscope is drawn in red ink.
One leaf fragment from a Persian manuscript.
MS Persian 26. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib--Caliph--approximately 600-661
Astronomy, Ancient--Iran
Persian literature
